clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text: For business transfers: We may share or transfer Your personal information in connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of Company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business to another company.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.
clauses.clause_text:
Your information, including Personal Data, is processed on Cakey Bot's servers and in any other places where the parties involved in the processing are located.
It means that this information may be transferred to — and maintained on — computers located outside of your state, province, country or other governmental jurisdiction where the data protection laws may differ than those from your jurisdiction.

case.text: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

clauses.title: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information
clauses.description: The service does not require users to reveal personal information for most of its website. However, it may still collect anonymous logs.
clauses.clause_text: You do not have to provide any personal data to be able to use our Discord Bot or to browse the website. We only require this information when you are making a purchase.

case.text: You can access most of the pages on the service's website without revealing any personal information

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text:
Cakey Bot may use Personal Data for the following purposes:

  • To provide and maintain our service, including to monitor the usage of our service.

  • For the performance of a contract: the development, compliance and undertaking of the purchase contract for the products, items or services You have purchased or of any other contract with Us through the service.

  • To contact you: by email or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation. (We will not use this for marketing or advertising)

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: The service will resist legal requests for your information where reasonably possible
clauses.description: The service will attempt to protect user information to a great extent, even so far as stating that they will only follow legal requirements to disclose user information in circumstances where this cannot be reasonably resisted.
clauses.clause_text:
Other Legal Requirements

Cakey Bot may disclose your Personal Data in the good faith belief that such action is necessary to:

  • Comply with a legal obligation

  • Protect and defend the rights or property of Cakey Bot

  • Prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the service

  • Protect the personal safety of users of Cakey Bot or the public

  • Protect against legal liability

and where this cannot be reasonably resisted

case.text: The service will resist legal requests for your information where reasonably possible

clauses.title: [PP] Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: You can find an archive of our previous privacy policies here

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text:
You can request access to your personal information, or correct or update out-of-date or inaccurate personal information we hold about you by sending us an email.
You can also request deletion of any personal data we hold on you by sending us an email.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: We also do not collect or store your IP address

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making
clauses.description: The service promises not to use your personal data for automated decision-making, including profiling.
clauses.clause_text: Your personal data will not be used for automated decision-making, including profiling

case.text: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making

clauses.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.
clauses.clause_text: We regularly review this Privacy Policy and make sure that we process your information in ways that comply with it.

case.text: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

clauses.title: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
clauses.clause_text: Any situation in which you have not successfully received or are unable to access premium perks

case.text: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

clauses.title: [ToS] Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.
clauses.description: The Service takes user suggestions into account to update its Terms.
clauses.clause_text: If you have specific questions about our terms of service you can send us an email.

case.text: Your feedback is invited regarding changes to the terms.

clauses.title: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches
clauses.description: Should the personal information of a service be compromised, the service will inform users if any personal data has been affected by data breaches. This case is also related to privacy.
clauses.clause_text: In the event we experience a breach of security, we will promptly notify you if your personal information has been compromised, in accordance with applicable law.

case.text: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell personal information.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: This service does not collect, use, or share location data
clauses.description: No location-based information is tracked by the service, so that it cannot be used or shared with third parties.
clauses.clause_text: or location data.

case.text: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

clauses.title: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used
clauses.description: There are no Google Analytics or other tracking codes embedded in the service. Any tracking is performed by the service itself.
clauses.clause_text: We do not use cookies or similar tracking technology

case.text: No third-party analytics or tracking platforms are used

clauses.title: The service does not use any third-party advertising services
clauses.description: The service does not put any paid third party advertisements on their platform
clauses.clause_text: We also do not use advertisements or third-party tools that are known to track users.

case.text: The service does not use any third-party advertising services

clauses.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
clauses.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.
clauses.clause_text:
Stripe
Their Privacy Policy can be viewed at https://stripe.com/us/privacy

  • PayPal
    Their Privacy Policy can be viewed at https://www.paypal.com/webapps/mpp/ua/privacy-full

case.text: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

clauses.title: When the service wants to change its terms, you are notified a week or more in advance.
clauses.description: Users will be notified a week before the Terms are somehow updated, which lets them a reasonable amount of time to carefully read the changes and perhaps stop using the services if they do not longer agree.
clauses.clause_text: We will notify you of any changes a week in advance.

case.text: When the service wants to change its terms, you are notified a week or more in advance.

clauses.title: [ToS] The terms for this service are easy to read
clauses.description: The Agreements are well-organised, define legal terms (where applicable), aren't needlessly long and may be pleasant to read.

clauses.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
clauses.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.

case.text: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials

clauses.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:
If you click on a third party link, you will be directed to that third party's site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.

We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.description: This service makes no warranty regarding the accuracy or reliability of any information that is given on its website or the results that may be obtained from the use of the service.
clauses.clause_text: Further, Cakey Bot does not warrant or make any representations concerning the accuracy, likely results, or reliability of the use of the materials on its website or otherwise relating to such materials or on any sites linked to this site.

case.text: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

clauses.clause_text: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of The United States of America and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.

clauses.description: The Terms may be updated without prior notice, but users will be notified of the changes at the moment they will start applying.
clauses.clause_text: We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our Discord server and update the "Last updated" date at the top of this Privacy Policy.
